scripts.setup: npm run install-global-modules & npm install & npm link typescript & npm run docs & npm link typescript & npm start
scripts.install-global-modules: npm install typescript typedoc commitizen cz-conventional-changelog semantic-release-gitlab conventional-changelog-cli del-cli copyfiles -g
scripts.build-styles: npm run styles & npm run styles-prod
scripts.build-single: npm run webpack-single & npm run webpack-single-prod && npm run copy-styles-single & npm pack ./dist/output/es5 & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-multi: npm run webpack-multi & npm run webpack-multi-prod && npm run copy-styles-multi & npm pack ./dist/output/es5-components & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-core: npm run webpack-core & npm run webpack-core-prod & npm pack ./dist/output/core & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-components: npm run webpack-components & npm run webpack-components-prod & npm pack ./dist/output/components & npm run move-tgz
scripts.build-all: npm run build-styles & npm run build-single & npm run build-multi & npm run build-core & npm run build-components
scripts.rebuild-all: npm run clean-dist & npm run build-all
scripts.publish-all: npm run build-all & npm run copy-styles
scripts.republish-all: npm run rebuild-all & npm run copy-styles
scripts.move-tgz: npm run copy-tgz & npm run del-tgz
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist & npm run clean-documentation
